name: p o w e r ARM
name_original: p o w e r ARM
description:
p o w e r ARM is a pixel-styled RPG made for Ludum Dare 39's Running out of Power. In this game, you must find resources to build your inventory to be strong enough to fight the evil Eagle, Inc.'s mercenaries. Do this successfully and, as legend would have it, you'll be treated to a nice surprise.

p o w e r ARM was developed start to finish in the span of 48 hours from July 28th to July 30th, by Eric Bernard.
